sentences: Õnnistan siis läinut mullaga / oma leinavaikses südames.
context: The word 'lahkunud' is the past participle form of the verb 'lahkuma' (to leave, to depart). It can mean someone who has left a place or departed from somewhere. In more solemn contexts, it can refer to someone who has passed away or died. The dictionary example shows its usage in the context of remembering those who have gone/departed.
